item.title: LLMs: Exploring To Understand
item.description: Delving into LLMs to probe how they do what they do.

item.title: LLMs: Understanding Tokens and Embeddings
item.description: An overview of what tokens and embeddings mean in the context of LLMs - and related models. Please use the code along side for more grounding. Code links towards the end.
